property.name: myOrderDetailQuery
property.value: select o.order_id, o.order_date, o.firstname, o.lastname, o.addr1, o.addr2, o.city, o.state, o.zip, o.country, o.email, o.phone, ol.image_url,ol.supplier_id,ol.item_id, ol.name, ol.order_line_points, ol.quantity, olsn.shipping_method, olsn.shipment_date, olsn.tracking_number, os.desc from orders o left join order_line ol on o.order_id=ol.order_id left join order_line_shipment_notification olsn on ol.order_id = olsn.b2s_order_id and ol.line_num = olsn.line_number left join order_status os on ol.order_status=os.status_id where o.order_id=?
